name: WoodAndStuff
description:
This is my entry for LudumDare 52 

Theme: Harvest 

Controls

WASD to move

Left mouse to harvest trees

Right mouse to drop off wood at campfire

Info

Had to work friday, saturday, and parts of sunday, and monday. 

So i managed to pull out this much of a game with the little time i had left. 

After making work arounds for the Godot 4 bugs i found, the game runs
